```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(shiny)
library(RWeka)
library(party)
library(bslib)
```



Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


```{r}

varSelectInput("Y", "Variable_Y:",iris)


```


```{r}
#selectInput("Y", "Variable_Y:",choices = c("Sepal.Length", "iris$Sepal.Width"), selceted= "Sepal.Length")
```


```{r}
head(iris)
```

Row
---------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
renderPlot({
   ggplot(data = iris, aes(x= Species, y= !!input$Y))+
  geom_bar(stat="identity")+
  ggtitle("Count of Species")
    
})  
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = iris, aes(x= Species, y= Petal.Width))+
  geom_bar(stat= "identity",  fill = "dark green")+
  geom_text(aes(label = Petal.Width), vjust = -0.2)+
  ggtitle("Count of Species")
```



```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(x="", y=Petal.Width , fill=Species)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", width=1) +
  coord_polar("y", start=0)
```

Page
------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
m1 <- J48(Species~., data = iris)
if(require("party", quietly = TRUE)) plot(m1)

```

```{r}
summary(m1)
```
